about_the_game:
Embark on a quest to find the parts of your crashed ship as you battle ruthless enemies and uncover the secrets of your true identity. Explore a variety of biomes, each teeming with fearsome creatures. Unlock unique abilities to refine your combat strategy and take on epic bosses with demanding mechanics that invite you to adapt your style.

  • Cell-Shaded Cutscenes: Immerse yourself in a captivating story that reveals Atrion's identity and role in this chaotic universe.

  • Varied Levels: Enjoy distinct environments and unique enemies.

  • Fast-Paced, Intense Combat: Execute fluid combos in dynamic confrontations, accompanied by the rhythm of electro/synthwave music.

  • Die and Retry: With no save points, every death brings you closer to victory as you learn to overcome challenges.

  • Customization: Unlock new abilities and adapt your strategy.

short_description: Immerse yourself in Atrion Project, a fast-paced hack-and-slash, die-and-retry action game. Incarn Atrion, a cybernetic hybrid, exploring diverse biomes, battling merciless enemies, unlocking unique abilities, and fighting epic bosses to rediscover your true identity.
